author: Joshua Robinson
title: Long-Track Speedskating Adds Chaos
text:
GANGNEUNG, South Koreaâ€”For a sport that hands out more medals than any other at the Winter Olympics, long-track speedskating has one glaring flaw. It can be a little boring.
Fine, it can be a lot boring.

The Games have 12 different speedskating events that feature nothing more than skaters going off in pairs in a procession that excites the...
